# Technical infrastructure

This document contains (almost) all the information about how ResearchEquals is managed.

## DNS

The DNS records for ResearchEquals are maintained using [CloudFlare](https://cloudflare.com). 

::: {.callout-warning}
We're currently in the process of migrating things over
:::

If you need any updates to the DNS records, please file a ticket in the [LibScie Manager](https://mngr.libscie.org).

## Flightcontrol

The production services are deployed using Flightcontrol, as connected to our Amazon Web Services account.
